nodes.name: Elara Moonwhisper
nodes.description: A wise elven mage with silvery hair and piercing blue eyes.

nodes.name: Grommash Ironheart
nodes.description: A stout dwarf warrior with a fiery red beard and battle-worn armor.

nodes.name: Shadowfang
nodes.description: A massive, black-furred dire wolf with glowing red eyes.

nodes.name: Mistwood Forest
nodes.description: A dense, misty forest with ancient trees and hidden mysteries.

nodes.name: Moonstone Amulet
nodes.description: A silver amulet with a glowing moonstone that enhances magical abilities.

nodes.name: The Curse of Shadowfang
nodes.description: Defeat the monstrous dire wolf Shadowfang to lift the curse on Mistwood Forest.

nodes.name: The Great Mist
nodes.description: A supernatural mist that engulfed Mistwood Forest, bringing dark creatures with it.

nodes.name: Order of the Silver Moon
nodes.description: A secretive guild of mages dedicated to protecting the realm from supernatural threats.

links.description: Elara is a high-ranking member of the Order of the Silver Moon.
Elara wears the Moonstone Amulet, enhancing her magical powers.
Grommash is currently exploring Mistwood Forest.
Shadowfang lurks in the depths of Mistwood Forest.
